properties.areaDesc: Waters from Cape Mendocino to Pt. Arena CA from 10 to 60 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 23 at 2:38AM PST until January 25 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...South winds 10 to 20 kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas
10 to 15 feet expected.

* WHERE...Cape Mendocino to Pt Arena 10 to 60 nm.

* WHEN...From 9 PM this evening to 3 AM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM PST SATURDAY
